name: Nisan Haramati
bio: Nisan is a chaos engineer at Wallaroo Labs. He likes to learn about complex systems by breaking them in every conceivable manner... And probably a few inconceivable ones. Prior to joining Wallaroo Labs, Nisan worked on large scale data infrastructure where he discovered a passion for data correctness in data systems. His time outside of work is divided between elaborate food projects and taking off into the mountains of the Pacific North West with his fluffy sidekick, Meru.
